entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 in wind prone areas late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
